titleStmt.title: A call to a general reformation of manners and manifesting in several particulars the great lets and hinderances thereunto / preached at the arch-deacon of Sudbury's visitation, holden at Kentford in Suffolk in April last, 1700, by Clement Heigham, Esq., now rector of Barrow in Suffolk.
titleStmt.author: Heigham, Clement, d. 1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Darby for Richard Thurlbourn ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
